oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Franklin Delano Roosevelt
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of Franklin Delano Roosevelt and signed with: "To Emil Hurja from his friend Franklin D. Roosevelt."

Franklin Delano Roosevelt (1882-1945) was the 32nd President of the United States (1933-1945). He was the only president elected to more than two terms of office (he died in office during his fourth term). He was 5th cousin of President Theodore Roosevelt.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Roosevelt, Franklin D. (Franklin Delano), 1882-1945
Presidents--United States--Pictorial works
